department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:...The department has a requirement for the purchase of subscription agent service for acquisition, delivery, and related support of publication subscriptions, articles, and access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
## Subscription Agent Services
#### Invitation to Submit a Proposal
#### Notice Synopsis
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified firms to submit a proposal for Subscription Agent Services.

### Background and Objectives
The Canadian Forces College requires a firm to act on their behalf (Subscription Agent) to acquire subscriptions to publications of all types and media, deliver, manage, and related support of said subscriptions, and access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform. The anticipated start date is February 2024, and the proposed contract period is one year from contract award date with two (2) one-year option periods.

### Scope of Work
The successful vendor shall provide the following services:
- Acquisition of subscriptions to publications of all types and in all media
- Delivery, management, and related support of said subscriptions
- Access to the Electronic Resource Management Platform

### Evaluation Criteria
The selection criteria for this procurement are based on variations or combinations of the above methods. The proposal must include all supporting documentation and must be submitted by 20 February 2024, by 14:00 EST.

### Invitation to Bid
Only the following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
- EBSCO Canada LTD.

### Contact Information
For any questions, please contact:
- Curran, Matthew
- Email: [matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.curran@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18709532?extsite=MTg3MDk1MzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: This tender announcement is closed to new bidders and is currently closed to prospective suppliers. The bid closing time has been changed from the original posting and bidders are expected to submit their proposals by 20 February 2024. Any bid submitted after 14:00 EST on the same day will be declared non-compliant. Please disregard any information indicating the original closing time.  Adhering to Canada's trade agreements, this procurement applies to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).  Evaluation of offers shall be based on Variations or combinations of the above methods.

### Application and Bid Submission
To apply, bidders must submit their proposal electronically through https: //discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18709532?extsite
